How do you get the Kerbals to use their jetpacks when the go outside their ship? Every time I press EVA and the Kerbal lets go, they're lost in space unless I can some how rescue them... Please help!!

Thanks,

E

Press "R" and that should activate the jet pack. Controlling it is another story.... ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Like so many others, [I can link to this page](http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Key_bindings). But the long story short, WASDQE (unless you've remapped) will control your kerbal.

Welcome to the forum! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Cheers,

~Claw

For more controls, check out the KSP Wiki:

[http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Key_bindings/nl](http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Key_bindings/nl)

The wiki is a good reliable source of the basic info of KSP (I use it quite a lot ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif) )
Thank you, I'll give it a shot. At least Jeb wont be floating around lost in space any more. Now he at least has a chance of making it back to his capsule!!
